name: Onmund

aspects.trouble: Must Prove Mages Are Not Monsters

stunts: Ward Specialist: +2 to Defend with Lore against spell attacks or magical traps.
Steady Hands: Once per scene, Onmund may reduce an ally's mental stress taken from a magical effect by 1 (teamwork justification required).

starting_equipment.armor: College Robes (Armor:0, +1 to Lore when studying/casting in calm conditions)

notes: Onmund is earnest, defensive of the College's mission, and uncomfortable with Skyrim's anti-mage prejudice. He's a reliable 'support caster' in conflicts.
combat_tactics: Prioritizes wards and protective magic, then controlled ranged spells. Avoids collateral damage unless forced.
